price: 20. Daarmee zal alles wat in hun buiken is smelten of verdwijnen, en ook (hun) huiden.
arabic: يُصۡهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ وَٱلۡجُلُودُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yuṣ'haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūdu
